entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, mentioned as having a half-eaten bit of toast slipping from his fingers.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another main character, mentioned as letting out a huge gasp and flattening the newspaper.

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge is introduced as the new 'High Inquisitor' appointed by the Ministry of Magic.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as having written a letter to Harry mentioning an article in the Daily Prophet.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is introduced as passing new legislation giving itself control at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Harry reacts to Hermione's gasp and flattening the newspaper.
Harry is concerned about Dolores Umbridge being appointed as 'High Inquisitor'.
Hermione reacts to the news of Dolores Umbridge's appointment.
The Ministry of Magic's new legislation affects Harry Potter.
